name: Puttu (Steamed Rice Cake)
description: Cylindrical steamed rice cake with coconut
instructions: Mix rice flour with water to breadcrumb consistency
Layer flour and coconut in puttu maker
Traditionally served with banana and jaggery
cultural_notes: Breakfast staple, eaten sweet or with curry
description_sinhala: පොල් සමග සිලින්ඩරාකාර තැම්බූ සහල් කේක්
description_tamil: தேங்காய் சேர்த்து உருளை வடிவ அரிசி கேக்
cultural_notes_sinhala: උදේ ආහාරය ප්‍රධාන ආහාරය, පැණිරස හෝ ව්‍යංජන සමඟ අනුභව කරනු ලැබේ
cultural_notes_tamil: காலை உணவு பிரதானமானது, இனிப்பு அல்லது கறியுடன் உண்ணப்படுகிறது
